info.name: Steam - Holiday Profile 2015
info.description: Important: Click the "Show CSS Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show CSS Code" button much easier to find. â€• Yay ~ ! The Holiday Profile 2015 is here on usertstyles.org! If you have missed the chance to get this profile because you were too busy buying gifts for all your friends, or you simply want to use this profile permanently and until next year, then here you have it! Merry Xmas everyone! Feel free to share it with all your friends! Version: 1.0.5 | View change logs
info.additionalInfo: I re-created this profile for people who could not get their hands on the complete set of this Holiday profile or simply because they did not want to waste their precious money on some cheap trading cards to get it since this add-on will disappear forever eventually. And I am sorry for the delay, in all honesty, I did not want to do it since I think this new Holiday profile is just ugly compared to the Steam Holiday Profile 2014. Each to their own, I guess. Everything is there, the ribbons, the header background, AND the animated snow since someone was sad about the fact that I did not add it. Change logs: View change logs
